definition: to follow/to continue
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to continue/to replenish

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人謝拉的兒子約巴接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Manasseh his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子瑪拿西接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Jehoash his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子約阿施接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Ahaziah his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子亞哈謝接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，毯螅地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Rehoboam his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子羅波安接續他作王。

sentences.english: When Jobab died, Husham from the land of the Temanites succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，提幔地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: When Shaul died, Baal-Hanan son of Acbor succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅死了，亞革波的兒子巴勒哈南接續他作王。

sentences.english: In the course of time, Nahash king of the Ammonites died, and his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 此後，亞捫人的王拿轄死了，他兒子接續他作王。

sentences.english: And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅死了，亞革波的兒子巴勒哈南接續他作王。

sentences.english: When Baal-Hanan son of Acbor died, Hadad succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 亞革波的兒子巴勒哈南死了，哈達接續他作王。

sentences.english: And Abijah his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子亞比雅接續他作王。

sentences.english: And the people of the land took Jehoahaz son of Josiah and anointed him and made him king in place of his father.
sentences.chinese: 國民膏約西亞的兒子約哈斯接續他父親作王。

sentences.english: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，毯螅地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: Number the footnotes consecutively within the same chapter and start over in new ones.
sentences.chinese: 各章內編號連續，各章之間不相接續。

sentences.english: And Jehoiachin his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子約雅斤接續他作王。

definition: to continue/to go on/to last
project
digital
general/commander-in-chief (military)/king (chess piece)/to command/to lead
to desire/to invite/to request
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
to start (a machine)/(fig.) to set in motion/to launch (an operation)/to activate (a plan)
to unfold/to carry out/to be in full swing/to launch
to collect/to compile/to converge/also written 彙集|汇集[hui4 ji2]
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to introduce into/to channel/to lead/to guide into/to import (data)
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to be witness to/witness/evidence
to cross over (by ferry)/transition/interim/caretaker (administration)
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
